user.title: SmartThings Find manual login
user.description:
1) Open: [smartthingsfind.samsung.com](https://smartthingsfind.samsung.com)
2) Login in your browser, then DevTools(F12) → Network
3) Select `chkLogin.do` request (refresh if needed)
4) Copy Request Headers → **Cookie:** (the whole line)
5) Paste it below

data.cookie_input: Full Cookie header (e.g. Cookie: a=b; c=d)

error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Cookie expired or invalid.
